  "title": "Senior Structural Engineer",
  "description": "At Biufort Homes Limited, we are committed to redefining excellence in the construction and real estate industry. Guided by standards, we are set to deliver cutting-edge designs and sustainable solutions that elevate lifestyles and exceed client expectations.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Senior Structural Engineer
Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job brief


	We are seeking a detail-focused, knowledgeable and professional Senior Structural Engineer to join our team! The ideal fit for the role will have a strong background in building and designing buildings and be adept with structural engineering processes and standards.
	The role involves providing technical leadership, mentoring junior engineers, and collaborating with multidisciplinary teams to deliver successful project outcomes.


Key Responsibilities


	Prepare and review structural designs, drawings, and specifications for buildings, bridges, and infrastructure projects.
	Conduct structural analysis using relevant engineering software (e.g., STAAD Pro, ETABS, SAP2000, Revit Structure).
	Provide innovative and cost-effective design solutions while maintaining safety and performance.
	Oversee structural engineering activities throughout all project phases - concept, design, construction, and commissioning.
	Coordinate with architects, mechanical/electrical engineers, and contractors to ensure design integration.
	Prepare and manage design schedules, budgets, and resource allocation.
	Conduct site inspections to verify compliance with approved structural designs.
	Analyze and make changes to ongoing projects as they move onward to ensure the safety of structures being built.
	Work in line with local building codes, considering flooding, fire safety measures, and other variables such as wind tunnels and surface quality.
	Inspect and analyze existing buildings to determine their safety or viability to be made safe again.
	Make recommendations to close or demolish unsafe buildings if deemed unsafe to habitation or a risk to the local community.
	Make plans to renovate listed buildings that may need original restoration work.
	Work in line with health and safety guidelines.


Requirements


	Bachelor&#39;s or Master&rsquo;s Degree in Civil/Structural Engineering or related field
	5 - 7 years of relevant structural design and supervision experience.
	COREN or relevant professional engineering license (mandatory or preferred).
	Demonstrated experience in a structural engineering role
	Ability to read and interpret drawings and diagrams
	Strong ability in drawing, designing, and creating diagrams, blueprints, and drawings
	Strong analytical skills, with a keen attention to detail
	Strong communication skills, both written and verbal
	Demonstrated knowledge of health and safety guidelines
	Good report writing skills
	Strong manual dexterity
	Good problem-solving abilities
	Ability to prioritize own time and workload
	Strong proficiency in structural design and analysis software.
	Excellent communication, leadership, and team management skills.


Other Requirements:


	Commute to this job&rsquo;s location
	Can start immediately
	Accept a background check
	Working in an onsite setting


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested candidate should send their application to:&nbsp;hr.biufort@gmail.com&nbsp;using &quot;Application for Snr. Structural Engineer&rdquo; as the subject of the email.

Senior Structural Engineer Job at Biufort Homes Limited




        
    

        
        At Biufort Homes Limited, we are committed to redefining excellence in the construction and real estate industry. Guided by standards, we are set to deliver cutting-edge designs and sustainable solutions that elevate lifestyles and exceed client expectations.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Senior Structural Engineer
Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job brief
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking a detail-focused, knowledgeable and professional Senior Structural Engineer to join our team! The ideal fit for the role will have a strong background in building and designing buildings and be adept with structural engineering processes and standards.
	The role involves providing technical leadership, mentoring junior engineers, and collaborating with multidisciplinary teams to deliver successful project outcomes.


Key Responsibilities


	Prepare and review structural designs, drawings, and specifications for buildings, bridges, and infrastructure projects.
	Conduct structural analysis using relevant engineering software (e.g., STAAD Pro, ETABS, SAP2000, Revit Structure).
	Provide innovative and cost-effective design solutions while maintaining safety and performance.
	Oversee structural engineering activities throughout all project phases - concept, design, construction, and commissioning.
	Coordinate with architects, mechanical/electrical engineers, and contractors to ensure design integration.
	Prepare and manage design schedules, budgets, and resource allocation.
	Conduct site inspections to verify compliance with approved structural designs.
	Analyze and make changes to ongoing projects as they move onward to ensure the safety of structures being built.
	Work in line with local building codes, considering flooding, fire safety measures, and other variables such as wind tunnels and surface quality.
	Inspect and analyze existing buildings to determine their safety or viability to be made safe again.
	Make recommendations to close or demolish unsafe buildings if deemed unsafe to habitation or a risk to the local community.
	Make plans to renovate listed buildings that may need original restoration work.
	Work in line with health and safety guidelines.


Requirements


	Bachelor's or Master’s Degree in Civil/Structural Engineering or related field
	5 - 7 years of relevant structural design and supervision experience.
	COREN or relevant professional engineering license (mandatory or preferred).
	Demonstrated experience in a structural engineering role
	Ability to read and interpret drawings and diagrams
	Strong ability in drawing, designing, and creating diagrams, blueprints, and drawings
	Strong analytical skills, with a keen attention to detail
	Strong communication skills, both written and verbal
	Demonstrated knowledge of health and safety guidelines
	Good report writing skills
	Strong manual dexterity
	Good problem-solving abilities
	Ability to prioritize own time and workload
	Strong proficiency in structural design and analysis software.
	Excellent communication, leadership, and team management skills.


Other Requirements:


	Commute to this job’s location
	Can start immediately
	Accept a background check
	Working in an onsite setting


Method of Application 
Interested candidate should send their application to: hr.biufort@gmail.com using "Application for Snr. Structural Engineer” as the subject of the email.

Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

Internal Control Analyst Job at House of Tara International




        
    

        
        House of Tara International - We are House of Tara, the largest brand in the beauty and cosmetics industry out of Africa. We currently have over 13 branches across Nigeria with sales presence in Ghana, Seychelles, Tanzania, Kenya & South Africa. Our company takes pride in not just beauty consultation, but in empowering women, creating self-awareness and enhancing self-esteem.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Internal Control Analyst
Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Are you an experienced Internal Control Auditor/Analyst looking for an exciting opportunity in the cosmetics industry?
	We are seeking a skilled professional to strengthen our internal control framework, ensuring compliance, efficiency, and risk mitigation.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop, implement, and monitor internal control policies and procedures.
	Conduct audits to evaluate financial and operational controls.
	Identify risks, control gaps, and areas of non-compliance.
	Provide recommendations for process improvements.
	Ensure compliance with regulatory and company policies.
	Work closely with departments to strengthen control frameworks.


Requirements


	Professional certifications such as ICAN, CIA, CISA, ACCA, or CPA are a plus.
	Cognate experience in internal control, auditing, or risk management.
	Background in a cosmetics-related company is an added advantage.
	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
	Excellent communication and report-writing abilities.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter to: talents@houseoftara.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Customer Care Executive",
  "description": "At 5thWall Consulting, we are a dynamic outsourcing firm dedicated to providing end-to-end recruitment solutions for businesses across various industries. We specialize in helping organizations attract, assess, and hire top talent that aligns with their goals and culture.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Care Executive

Job Location:&nbsp;Sangotedo, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Summary


	We seek a highly skilled and customer-focused Customer Care representative to provide exceptional service to our customers, resolve complex queries and concerns, and build strong relationships that drive loyalty and retention.


Key Responsibilties
Client Communication and Relationship Management:


	Handle inquiries from prospective and existing clients via phone calls, emails, social media, and in-person visits.
	Provide accurate information about properties, services, and company policies.
	Maintain a professional and courteous attitude in all interactions.


Complaint Resolution:


	Address client complaints efficiently and escalate complex issues to the appropriate department for resolution.
	Follow up on complaints to ensure they are resolved in a timely manner.
	Keep records of all client concerns and track resolutions for future reference.


Client Follow-Up and Retention:


	Conduct follow-ups with clients who have made inquiries, attended inspections, or shown interest in properties.
	Maintain positive client relationships by providing updates on new properties, promotions, and company initiatives.
	Gather feedback from clients to improve service delivery.


Accurate Record Keeping:


	Maintain a database of client information, inquiries, complaints, and resolutions.
	Document all interactions with clients for accountability and future reference.
	Prepare and submit periodic reports on client concerns and satisfaction levels.


Coordination with other departments:


	Work closely with sales, marketing, and legal teams to provide accurate information to clients.
	Ensure that client requests are communicated to the relevant teams for prompt action.
	Support administrative tasks related to customer service and documentation.


Ensuring Professionalism and Brand Representation:


	Uphold the company&#39;s reputation by providing excellent service and maintaining professionalism in all interactions.
	Represent the company at events, property inspections, and client meetings when required.
	Ensure that all client-facing communication aligns with the company&#39;s brand guidelines and values.


Site Inspection Coordination:


	Assist clients in scheduling site inspections and provide them with the necessary details.
	Coordinate with the admin and logistics teams to ensure smooth transportation arrangements.
	Gather client feedback after inspections to improve future experiences.


Customer Satisfaction Monitoring:


	Conduct surveys and gather feedback to measure client satisfaction and identify areas for improvement.
	Analyze client complaints and feedback trends to suggest improvements in service delivery.


Qualifications &amp; Requirements


	Bachelor&#39;s degree in a related field (Business, Communications, Customer Service, or equivalent)
	Proven customer service experience, preferably in a similar industry
	Excellent communication, interpersonal, and problem-solving skills
	Ability to work in a fast-paced environment, handling multiple priorities and customer interactions simultaneously
	Strong analytical and conflict resolution skills, with a customer-centric mindset
	Speaks fluent and professional English
	Excellent customer service and communication skills
	Ability to build rapport with customers
	Professional demeanor and presentation
	Top-notch dressing sense
	Proven experience in customer relations.


Key Skills &amp; Competencies:


	Customer service, relations management and relationship-building skills
	Effective communication and active listening. Excellent communication skills (verbal and&nbsp;written)
	Problem-solving, conflict resolution, negotiation and Proactive attitude
	Time management, organization, and multitasking
	Adaptability, flexibility, and resilience in a dynamic environment
	Good phone and email etiquette
	Basic computer and CRM software proficiency
	Attention to detail and good organizational skills
	Customer-centric mindset with a focus on delivering exceptional service
	Emotional intelligence, calmness, empathy, and self-awareness.
	Strong communication, interpersonal, and relationship-building skills
	Ability to work under pressure, managing stress and maintaining composure. (Ability to&nbsp;handle pressure and resolve conflicts effectively)
	Continuous learning, improvement, and professional development
	Strong teamwork and collaboration skills.


Salary
N150,000 - N250,000 Monthly.",

Customer Care Executive Job at 5thWall Consulting




        
    

        
        At 5thWall Consulting, we are a dynamic outsourcing firm dedicated to providing end-to-end recruitment solutions for businesses across various industries. We specialize in helping organizations attract, assess, and hire top talent that aligns with their goals and culture.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Care Executive

Job Location: Sangotedo, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We seek a highly skilled and customer-focused Customer Care representative to provide exceptional service to our customers, resolve complex queries and concerns, and build strong relationships that drive loyalty and retention.


Key Responsibilties
Client Communication and Relationship Management:


	Handle inquiries from prospective and existing clients via phone calls, emails, social media, and in-person visits.
	Provide accurate information about properties, services, and company policies.
	Maintain a professional and courteous attitude in all interactions.


Complaint Resolution:


	Address client complaints efficiently and escalate complex issues to the appropriate department for resolution.
	Follow up on complaints to ensure they are resolved in a timely manner.
	Keep records of all client concerns and track resolutions for future reference.


Client Follow-Up and Retention:


	Conduct follow-ups with clients who have made inquiries, attended inspections, or shown interest in properties.
	Maintain positive client relationships by providing updates on new properties, promotions, and company initiatives.
	Gather feedback from clients to improve service delivery.


Accurate Record Keeping:


	Maintain a database of client information, inquiries, complaints, and resolutions.
	Document all interactions with clients for accountability and future reference.
	Prepare and submit periodic reports on client concerns and satisfaction levels.


Coordination with other departments:


	Work closely with sales, marketing, and legal teams to provide accurate information to clients.
	Ensure that client requests are communicated to the relevant teams for prompt action.
	Support administrative tasks related to customer service and documentation.


Ensuring Professionalism and Brand Representation:


	Uphold the company's reputation by providing excellent service and maintaining professionalism in all interactions.
	Represent the company at events, property inspections, and client meetings when required.
	Ensure that all client-facing communication aligns with the company's brand guidelines and values.


Site Inspection Coordination:


	Assist clients in scheduling site inspections and provide them with the necessary details.
	Coordinate with the admin and logistics teams to ensure smooth transportation arrangements.
	Gather client feedback after inspections to improve future experiences.


Customer Satisfaction Monitoring:


	Conduct surveys and gather feedback to measure client satisfaction and identify areas for improvement.
	Analyze client complaints and feedback trends to suggest improvements in service delivery.


Qualifications & Requirements


	Bachelor's degree in a related field (Business, Communications, Customer Service, or equivalent)
	Proven customer service experience, preferably in a similar industry
	Excellent communication, interpersonal, and problem-solving skills
	Ability to work in a fast-paced environment, handling multiple priorities and customer interactions simultaneously
	Strong analytical and conflict resolution skills, with a customer-centric mindset
	Speaks fluent and professional English
	Excellent customer service and communication skills
	Ability to build rapport with customers
	Professional demeanor and presentation
	Top-notch dressing sense
	Proven experience in customer relations.


Key Skills & Competencies:


	Customer service, relations management and relationship-building skills
	Effective communication and active listening. Excellent communication skills (verbal and written)
	Problem-solving, conflict resolution, negotiation and Proactive attitude
	Time management, organization, and multitasking
	Adaptability, flexibility, and resilience in a dynamic environment
	Good phone and email etiquette
	Basic computer and CRM software proficiency
	Attention to detail and good organizational skills
	Customer-centric mindset with a focus on delivering exceptional service
	Emotional intelligence, calmness, empathy, and self-awareness.
	Strong communication, interpersonal, and relationship-building skills
	Ability to work under pressure, managing stress and maintaining composure. (Ability to handle pressure and resolve conflicts effectively)
	Continuous learning, improvement, and professional development
	Strong teamwork and collaboration skills.


Salary
N150,000 - N250,000 Monthly.
